main_txt_01_01: Please select or upload the image
main_txt_01_02: on the back through the QR code.
sub01_txt_02: Please enter the issued verification code.
alert_txt_authNum_error:
There is no matched verification code.
Please check again.
sub02_txt_01: Please check the photo CARD image.
sub03_txt_01: The photo card is being printed. Please wait a moment.
sub03_txt_02: It takes about 1 minute for the card to print.
sub03_txt_03: Don't pick the card until the output is completed!
alert_txt_print_complete:
Your photo card has been printed!
Please check the output tray below.
Thank you!
alert_txt_print_complete_02: The popup will be closed automatically after 3 seconds.
alert_txt_purchase_failure:
The payment was not completed normally.
Please try again.
alert_txt_paymentcard_failure:
This card is not valid.
Please use another card.
alert_txt_print_failure:
The payment amount will be refunded
 because the printout is not done properly.
 If the refund has not been made, please
 contact the administrator.
We apologize for the inconvenience 
caused to you.
alert_txt_card_refill:
The card balance is insufficient.
 For smooth use, please contact the administrator
 and proceed with replacement.
